website_summaries.verdict: The Asus U56E-BBL6 budget laptop has all the desired features, including a fast Core i5 processor, cutting-edge features, and best-in-class battery life, sold for a price few can pass up.
pros: WiDi 2.0 and WiMAX wireless technologies built-in
cons: WiDi 2.0 requires Netgear receiver, a $99 purchase

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mid-range laptop
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for portable gaming, exciting design, or the lowest price around; keep looking. If you need a solid computer for an excellent price; this is a good choice. This unit has a metal body, which is more durable and easier to clean than plastic. The manufacturer calls it an "UltraBook" (Intel's marketing term) for it's thin profile and other features, but it does include an (internal) DVD drive, something generally omitted in this class. RAM and CPU are well above the minimum, and the unit is thin, light, cool, and quiet. This is an excellent computer for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Lucien Jacquet

customer_reviews.title: Not even worth 1 star
customer_reviews.text: I purchased mine about 1 year ago, and went to the expense to have it downgraded to Windows 7 since Windows 8 sucks. It was going along well, but then I had hardware failure - could not connect to the internet. Luckily it was within 1 year, so I sent it back to ASUS and sure, enough, they replaced the bad hardware, and sent it back with a clean copy of WINDOWS 8! I sent in all the paperwork indicating WINDOWS 7! I'm going to sell it as is and get something else. My bad idea to buy it. I trusted ASUS - have used their mother boards for years. But their laptops are not a good idea...
customer_reviews.author: Spock

customer_reviews.title: Not really as great as it should be
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this computer from warehouse deals and am not sure how much of my complaints are due to the condition of the computer when it was sent and how much is from the computer itself. The trackpad gestures seem to randomly turn themselves off, it takes quite awhile (2 mins) to wake from sleep mode, and the hard drive it already glitchy with video files (had it only 30 days). I'm returning it and getting something better, but very disappointed. I'm not a fan of windows 8 after trying it here and honestly the computer also seems to not like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Pamperwithrachel

customer_reviews.title: Its very comfortable.  easy to use.  Sound is awesome for a lap top.
customer_reviews.text: I have upgraded it to Windows 8.1 PRO With Media Center I installed Office 2013 Professional Plus ++ Visio, Project. Very happy, except every application on the machine, Every Service is running at 32 Bit on my 64 Bit OS with an i5 processor. ASUS Support has asked me to ship it back to them to Repair. After much research thats what I am going to do. I am typing on it now. But? They will fix it, and it is a killer machine, when it comes home from ASUS it gets a ram upgrade from 6 to 16 GIG so I can go nuts with Hyper-V My own Lab
customer_reviews.author: Michael Thompson

customer_reviews.title: worked well for the first 3 but then began slowing down and for some reason and it kicks me off the wifi quite frequently which
customer_reviews.text: Owned laptop for about 5 years now, worked well for the first 3 but then began slowing down and for some reason and it kicks me off the wifi quite frequently which is annoying because I have to restart the computer. The battery sucks now and I have to practically keep it plugged in all the time. Good computer than ran efficiently for about 3-4 years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice laptop
customer_reviews.text: This laptop so very nice for the price a little more than $500. The screen is hi def. keys are easy to type. The i5 core is super fast. Has 750 G hard drive. It has everything I was looking for in a laptop. Windows 8 is not that hard to figure out. Just have to play with it a few minutes. Highly recommend this laptop. Quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Furfur

customer_reviews.title: Best laptop!
customer_reviews.text: It's been a year since I bought this laptop and it is amazing! I love it! Works well, it's fast and it has a great design. Asus is one of the best computer brands and they do not disappoint. I recommend this laptop or any Asus product, very reliable. The shipping and handling were very good too. Of course, as with any electronic device, you have to take good care of it for it to last longer. This always works for me. I never write reviews but this laptop deserves it :)
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working a year after I purchased it. Got it repaired and it is not working anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like Asus
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my roomie. He has been using it throughout the life of his PhD. Most ASUS products i had are reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Robin.H

customer_reviews.title: Great college laptop
customer_reviews.text: Needed a college laptop in a hurry to replace a fried unit. The student shopped hard. This one met all of his exacting criteria, and met the parent budget too. Not a gaming system, but plenty of power for school and business apps, as well as streaming media. Good battery life and a rugged frame. Very nice system. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Edmond Gore

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: love this, my old computer was slow and fat and wasnt great then i got this and my sims works and i love everything about it. i got a skin for my computer because the finish shows a lot of finger prints. i wish the web cam was a little bit better quality but i still love this computer and its size
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: great computer
customer_reviews.text: this is a really go laptop. Works very well with the SSD. The only complaint is that it comes with windows 8. Since this is not a touch screen computer windows 7 would be a better choice.
customer_reviews.author: dococt168

customer_reviews.title: Randomly Shuts Off
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this laptop because Asus is a decent brand and it had a lot of the features I wanted. Since we've gotten it and used it, we've had problems with it turning off with no warning and for no apparent reason. I can be writing a paper or surfing the internet and next thing you know it's completely shut off. It's very frustrating. I would avoid purchasing this computer for that reason alone. Other than the shutting off randomly, it works well. The instant on feature is very nice. Windows 8 is terrible, but that has nothing to do with that laptop itself or its functioning.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Skaife

customer_reviews.title: Way more than i expected!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this computer for personal use, mainly for music and other basic computer functions. i got the computer and it was nicely packaged and wrapped. I was a little concerned though cause this was my first Windows 8 computer and i didn't know how much i would like it...but after a few minutes i fell in love with it!! The computer has a beautiful island keyboard that is almost silent when you are typing. I didn't expect that! It also runs very smoothly and without delay it turns on within seconds after sleeping. i Defiantly recommend this laptop!
customer_reviews.author: Darius

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this laptop almost a year ago and it has met all of needs and fully supports and runs all of the hardware I've added since then. I would recommend this laptop to anyone that is not a heavy gamer requiring a little more speed.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: This is an all-around great system
customer_reviews.text: It's brushed metal construction but lightweight. It shipped with Windows 8 but I cut it back to Windows 7 and had no problem finding all the drivers painlessly. I repartitioned the drives; it ships with a 24 GB SSD that contained the recovery partition which I changed to hold the swap file. It screams. Actually, I'd give it a 4 1/2 if I had that option because the screen is a LITTLE bit too small for my tastes, but the performance and quality and price are right on the moonyana.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It looks sexy.
customer_reviews.text: But doesn't seem to be built well. The monitor is flimsy (and has stopped working if I rotate the monitor too far).
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: I didn't like it
customer_reviews.text: I'm extremely disappointed with this laptop. The screen malfunctions and goes blank constantly. I have to shake it around to make it work again. It does have it's good side. It is light, the design is not that bad. It doesn't overheat. But I still think it was a bad purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Franco

customer_reviews.title: Battery Issue
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this computer in February and the battery has already failed. They are going to take it back but I will be without my computer for an unknown period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Fun&Games

customer_reviews.title: Fits the need
customer_reviews.text: It is just what I need. Basic . Have had it for about 6 months and works well. Install McAfee and it should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: jay ponce

customer_reviews.title: ok, not great
customer_reviews.text: items to be improved 1. indicator when using Caps 2. 1 port for mic, and 1 port for headset 3. windows 8 is annoying - it takes you to a new screen when you do not mean to, and you do not even know why it happened. sometimes it pops up window store, but no button to close it. user is forced to go to the store. it just makes users hate windows more.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Lousy Network Card
customer_reviews.text: Please be aware that this laptop has a really lousy network card, all my other laptops stay connected except for this one. The connection is constantly dropping, When one sits next to the router the connection is wonderful and never drops.
customer_reviews.author: Jetzz

customer_reviews.title: I don't know I like Asus but for some reason they have gone down ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked for the first year. Then over heated, fried the motherboard got a new one and wouldn't read it got another one same issue. I don't know I like Asus but for some reason they have gone down in quality
customer_reviews.author: magic

customer_reviews.title: Surprise
customer_reviews.text: I was positively impressed by the size of the screen and the keyboard, even with a numerical panel. The unit is also very thin and light.
customer_reviews.author: jl

customer_reviews.title: Asus S56CA-DH51 15.6 I Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing body and speed..That's my 14th Laptop. I use to be Qusmio lover but I love Asus now, same time I HATE WINDOWS 8.. I will swap to Windows 7 very soon..
customer_reviews.author: Atilla Kucuk

customer_reviews.title: reliable laptop for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I've had this laptop for over three yrs now and still works great and feel like new. The aluminum finish is top quality.
customer_reviews.author: yoda23

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I like the product is good quality only the settings of the PC is different from other computer brand its euro set up not US setting
customer_reviews.author: Antonio B. Limosnero Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great speedy machine
customer_reviews.text: Bought this laptop for on-the-go work. Starts up super quick, has a gorgeous display, and can multitask prettywell. Runs adobe cs6 decently. Battery life is average. Slim and sleek design is awesome. I got the i5 version.
customer_reviews.author: TusK

customer_reviews.title: HD webcam?
customer_reviews.text: Everything is perfect except the webcam. It looks terrible when I do my video call. Otherwise, it is a good choice for laptop. When I first lift it out of the box, I was really surprised by its light weight. And its design is very cool.
customer_reviews.author: jeany_1312

customer_reviews.title: BIG PROBLEM WITH TOUCH PAD
customer_reviews.text: 2 FAILURES SCREEN WENT BLACK HAD TO REBOOT AND RELOAD WINDOWS 8, LOST MOUSE POINTER, HAD TO POWER OFF AND AGAIN REBOOT AND RELOAD WINDOWS 8 WORST PROBLEM IS USING THE TOUCH PAD, IT IS VERY SENSITIVE AND HAS BEEN DIFFICULT TO GET USE TOO.IT IS A CHALLENGE TO KEEP FROM USING SOME OF THE TOUCH PAD FEATURES WHEN TRYING TO USE THE MOUSE POINTER ON THE TOUCH PAD. IT IS FRUSTRATING TO HAVE THE SCREEN ENLARGE OR CHANGE SCREENS OR DROP DOWN BOX APPEAR WHEN YOU ARE JUST TRYING TO MOVE THE MOUSE, TAKES LOTS OF PRACTICE TO GET USE TOO
customer_reviews.author: fussy

customer_reviews.title: Tiles on the home page make for quick viewing!
customer_reviews.text: So far, it seems like a great buy. I am just learning to use windows 8 on this laptop. It is so different from my previous laptop. This won't be a thorough review because I haven't discovered much about the way it works, yet. The screen is so clear and the color is great! I've only used it off and on for 3 days. I haven't tried the split screen yet but it sounds fascinating.
customer_reviews.author: Sherril M.

customer_reviews.title: it is nice design, affordable price that is why I chose ...
customer_reviews.text: it is nice design, affordable price that is why I chose it over other brands, so far it is trouble free...
customer_reviews.author: Trent M Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: the product is very good and has a good quality
customer_reviews.text: the product is very good and has a good quality. I'm going to enjoy it a lot. Thanks so much.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas Romano

customer_reviews.title: Had to send it back to ASUS within 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Had to send it back to ASUS within 2 weeks to fix the hard drive. So far, I'm still seeing some error messages and random restarts due to an error message (WHEA_UNCORRECTABLE_ERROR), but I'm not sure if that's to do with ASUS or Windows 8. As of right now, I'm not happy, but if it's not losing memory or my files, I'll be okay, I guess...
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Correia

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: from design to usability .. great product, ASUS is a wonderfull machine. strongly recomended. Microsoft new operating system .. not so much.
customer_reviews.author: FRANCISCO ZEISING

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I use this laptop sparingly since i also have a desktop. The battery life is slightly shorter than I would prefer, however the processor runs fast and the integrated graphics is faster than expected. The 15.6 inch screen is too big for a college desk, but its perfect for anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Asus computer
customer_reviews.text: I like this computer very much. I like the overall sleek design and it's very lightweight. What I do not like about the computer is that the keys are not very well highlighted and therefore are difficult to see .
customer_reviews.author: Ivanho

customer_reviews.title: Battery: 2.5hrs full display and about 4 hours on battery saver.
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered on time. Meet most of my requirements except the battery which lasts only 2.5 hours on a full charge though i managed to get about 4 hrs on battery saver with low display. Otherwise the machine is superb and the sound especially is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Laston Chiliba

customer_reviews.title: ASUS notebook S56CA-DH51
customer_reviews.text: ASUS notebook is a leap ahead in the laptop design and function. The durable but lighter case is one of it's strong points, ( I haul it around in a delivery truck everyday), but the quiteness and very little heat discharge is a big plus also... With this ASUS DH-51 model's performance and attributes it's by far the best value out there...
customer_reviews.author: Boater

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it. The size and Non-scratch nature of the body makes it amazing. a little noisy, You barely hear, it wont be a problem. Fast and always reliable.
customer_reviews.author: SungTao

customer_reviews.title: Best Laptop since beginning of time
customer_reviews.text: This is the old version, but the performance and speed, since I bought it, has never decreased. It was a win-win!
customer_reviews.author: Jose Luis Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: A laptop that exceeds my expectation
customer_reviews.text: The laptop design is fabulous!!! I love it. It's light, thin, and easy to carry. Definitely would recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: chen

customer_reviews.title: asus laptop is a real treat
customer_reviews.text: Purchased an Asus 15.5 laptop around Christmas this year. The build quality is superb and is meeting all expectations. Love the keyboards visual contrast, makes locating the odd keys quick. Graphics excellent! This is a very nice well made laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Giem

customer_reviews.title: Great computer.
customer_reviews.text: Great computer. Item as described. Colors are clear-cut. I bought this for my cousin, and now I would like to get one for me.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy At The Price Point
customer_reviews.text: This computer met or exceeded my expectations when it arrived. I paid about $550 with taxes for it and came as described, booted up with no problems and has been running great after updating Windows 8 several times. I love the metal case (plastic ones just chip and crack). I have no problems, but will update if I do!
customer_reviews.author: Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Great fast computer that doesn't break the bank
customer_reviews.text: I love my ASUS. The only drawback is that my 11-year-old son loves it just as much and wants to use it for everything he does, from downloading his homework (it's all online these days) to his beloved Minecraft.
customer_reviews.author: bob prouty

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: ok computer not a big fan of the windows 8 on it but overall a good laptop slim and no problems out of it
customer_reviews.author: Carlos M.

customer_reviews.title: Needed notebook, had to return due to usb ports not functioning
customer_reviews.text: was looking forward to this laptop, seemed to be a good price for the setup but had to return it immediately due to usb ports not functioning.
customer_reviews.author: Home User

customer_reviews.title: cheap build, half the screen failed on day 2
customer_reviews.text: We had this two days and half the screen went blank on the 2nd day. After googling the problem, I discovered that this is an ongoing quality issue with ASUS, so I just decided to return it to Amazon. Amazon was great and took it back with no problems. Steer clear!
customer_reviews.author: sportphotographer

customer_reviews.title: some prblem after 5 months
customer_reviews.text: Good machine, but I am currently experimenting some problems with a noise, similar to a click, coming from de HDisk. Ihad to call to Asus warranty service in Mexico to try to solve the problem
customer_reviews.author: Pablo de Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Great computer
customer_reviews.text: I'm not extremely computer savvy but needed a machine that could do a little bit of everything with good reliability and speed and I think Asus nailed it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Does the job and beautifally designed
customer_reviews.text: Just as expected, it's quick and responsive, even when multitasking. It's an excellent piece of machinery for the price and I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Marco miramontes

customer_reviews.title: Too thin. MAKE SURE TO BUY AN EXTENDED WARRANTY
customer_reviews.text: Within 2 weeks the side of the screen split. Luckily I bought a warranty. Other than that it is a well built computer.m
customer_reviews.author: M. Sass

customer_reviews.title: asus rocks
customer_reviews.text: fast , thin, and light.windows 8 works well. heard lots of bad stuff about "8", I don't see what the big deal is.I think folks are afraid changes.
customer_reviews.author: luis viera

customer_reviews.title: Too good to be true, apparently.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two of these. The first one came in an had an obvious problem with the video connectors. Only red came through when the screen was placed a certain angles. (not crazy angles that you couldn't work at, either. Amazon helped us get a replacement right away (so fast that as i type this, both sit, repackaged for return on the coffee table in front of me. The second one had no backlight. The only way to make out anything on the screen was to shine a flashlight directly onto it and then you could slightly make out differences in lights and darks -- making our second one completely unusable. 0 for 2 with this model, we're moving on.
customer_reviews.author: Blakeley Blanchard

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like it, but it does have a bad pixel, so returned
customer_reviews.author: Wang Wenjian

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop!
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop for the price and it run great with intel CORE i5 run. Windows 8 is something that take to get use to. But over i Happy with my what I bought
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan M Ray

customer_reviews.title: Asus S56CA Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Apart from getting use to windows 8 system every thing seems okay. The DVD writer is a bit flimsy and it picks up all the finger marks on the case.
customer_reviews.author: Babu Panchal

customer_reviews.title: Shuts down on its own
customer_reviews.text: I'm a computer science student and I bought this computer for my girlfriend. So, yes, I know what I'm talking about. This computer shuts down on its own randomly, instantly, not just suspended or asleep, it dies. This is pretty annoying when my girlfriend is watching a movie or doing homework. I'm not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mauriel

customer_reviews.title: missing
customer_reviews.text: I was missing my product key number, but I love the speed and Windows 8.1. The easy access to sports is the best.
customer_reviews.author: ruben grant

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent performance. It fully completes my expectations. Windows 8 is not the best OS but it is not the worst either.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Cal

customer_reviews.title: ASUS S56Ca-DH51
customer_reviews.text: I have used the Asus laptop for 2 weeks. It is fast, light and well designed. You will love the instant on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Scott

customer_reviews.title: DIDN'T EVEN GET THROUGH SET-UP
customer_reviews.text: This is the FIRST laptop I've ever purchased/owned. I received it in 2 days. SO quick! I was so excited to use it so I took everything out put it together (saved all packaging THANK GOD) and plugged it in to charge. 3 1/2 hours later I turned it on while on charge and it just starting flickering white like a strobe light. OVER AND OVER so annoying! I didn't even get through the set-up before I knew it needed to be replaced. I'm sending it back for a replacement in hopes I will get one that DOESN'T flicker! We'll see!
customer_reviews.author: blondbird

customer_reviews.title: ASUS S56CA-DH51 is a great computer in this price category
customer_reviews.text: This computer is exactly what I want. It was packaged neatly and delivered in a nice box. It comes up quickly. The system is good for my personal use and for my classroom teaching. One minor thing is that the font size increases on IE and Firefox browsers when using the pad. The only negative thing is Windows 8. Tile screen is not a very effective method for me who used Windows for years. Windows 8.1 is better than 8. Still not very effective to use.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas C. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my new laptop! I'm usually a Mac user myself, but I'm really glad that I made the switch to PC. It's great for doing work as well as playing games, whereas my Mac was only ever good for doing just the work part. It was a lot cheaper as well! But it's of great quality and it's absolutely wonderful. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Merc

customer_reviews.title: The best Laptop I ever have
customer_reviews.text: The boot speed is incredible and price is worthwhile. I do reccomend it for those interested in having a light weight but powerfull lapgtop.
customer_reviews.author: Georges Leonardos

customer_reviews.title: OK but one flaw
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that there is no CD port. Otherwise it's fine. Arrived in good condition. Black case Is Large and light
customer_reviews.author: gkr

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this ultrabook! It runs great and it is really fast. Never waiting on anything. Start up really is two seconds when on sleep. The only thing that would make it a lot better if it had a blu-ray drive. Other than that it's a great laptop for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria  C.  Iglesias

customer_reviews.title: not my cup of tea!
customer_reviews.text: As you navigate the computer inadvertently enlarges the screen you are working on and I still haven't figured how to readjust it. I don't particularly like it!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Where is Office?
customer_reviews.text: First computer I ever purchased that did not come preloaded with Office. Very disappointed in this. I'm just getting used to the way Windows 8 works, but so far I'm not too impressed with it.
customer_reviews.author: Wileerex

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY FROM ASUS-THEY DO NOT HONOR WARRANTY
customer_reviews.text: I have had problems with this computer from the beginning. The ports have never worked on the Right side of my computer and I am unable to download pictures, attach speakers, or a back up Hard drive. I sent it to ASUS after dealing with all the problems and now even though I have had this computer less than a year, they are refusing to honor the 1 year warranty, stating the part is not covered. Nothing else. This is not acceptable. Avoid ASUS..nothing by headaches.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Experience
customer_reviews.text: Everything has been great from start to finish. If you want my feedback, don't tell me how many words to use. I'm the one spending my time to give you feedback; don't waste it.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the Money!!
customer_reviews.text: I chose a rating of one because the programs are AWFUL! There is no word processing program on here. Win 8 is not user friendly. The whole point of my purchasing a new laptop was for word processing. ASUS does not have a contract with Microsoft for the user to get Microsoft Starter; instead, you must pay an additional $200 to purchase and activate a key code. If you are needing this for actual work, such as research papers and power point presentation, it is not worth the cost. If you want to do online gaming and social media, it will fit your needs. Absolutely not recommended for those in the world of academia. $700+ wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Cole

product_meta.title: ASUS S56 15-Inch Laptop [OLD VERSION]
product_meta.description:
Black, 15.6-Inch HD (1366 x 768), Intel Core i5-3317U (1.7GHz), 6GB DDR3, Intel HD Graphics 4000, 750GB 5400RPM + 24G SSD/DL, DVD±RW/CDRW, W8 Home Premium (64bit), 802.11BGN, HD Camera, 1YR Global/1YR Accidental Damage/30-Day Zero Bright Dot/2-way FREE shipping/24-7 tech support
